name: Li Shang
info:
• 简体中文名: 李翔
  • 性别: 男
  • CV: BD Wong (speaking), Donny Osmond (singing)
detail: General Li Shang is the tritagonist of Disney's 1998 animated feature film, Mulan. The son of an army general, Shang aspires to succeed his father as the leader of "China's greatest troops". Shang's dreams are realized when he is appointed the head of a ragtag group of soldiers that must defend China from the tyranny of Shan Yu.
